chain_of_thought_reasoning: To find the average height of superheroes from Marvel Comics, I need to first identify the superheroes that are published by Marvel Comics. This requires joining the superhero table with the publisher table using the publisher_id. After finding the appropriate superheroes, I will calculate the average of their heights using the AVG function on the height_cm column. I need to ensure that I include only superheroes published by Marvel Comics and filter out any entries with null height values, as per the instructions.
SQL: SELECT AVG(T1.height_cm) FROM superhero T1 JOIN publisher T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' AND T1.height_cm IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(T1.height_cm) FROM superhero T1 JOIN publisher T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' AND T1.height_cm IS NOT NULL;
